connect20/plumslice_api.name: connect20/Plumslice_Api

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/plumslice_api.description: PlumSlice PIM API Magento extension provides seamless and automated Catalog( Products, Digital Assets, Hierarchies, and  Attributes) management using the Plumslice PIM application within the PlumSlice Collaboration Suite. The PlumSlice PIM out-of-box auto-synching process enables customers to manage enhanced and comprehensive product data in PIM which then automatically informs your Magento e-commerce site with the information needed to optimize your customer experience.
